title: Sort articles in descending order by date (latest first)

requirements.summary: Ensure all frontend article listing pages and components display articles sorted by date in descending order (newest first)
acceptanceCriteria: On the Home page, the hero and secondary story articles reflect the latest articles first.
On the Political News and Movie News pages, articles are listed from newest to oldest.
The Top Stories sidebar and Breaking News ticker display the most recent articles first.
No article with an older date appears before an article with a newer date in any list view.

file_operations.description: Apply client-side descending date sort to articles before selecting hero, secondary stories, and category sections to ensure the latest articles appear first.
Apply client-side descending date sort to political news articles before rendering the paginated list to ensure newest articles appear first.
Apply client-side descending date sort to movie news articles before rendering the paginated list to ensure newest articles appear first.
Apply client-side descending date sort to articles before selecting the top 5 to display in the sidebar, ensuring the most recent articles are shown.
Apply client-side descending date sort to articles before selecting the latest 10 titles for the ticker, ensuring breaking news shows the most recent articles first.
